title: Select a location
description: Choose a comfortable place where you will not be interrupted or have distractions.

title: Get comfortable
description: Wear comfortable and loose clothing. You can also use a blanket, pillow or cushion if you want.

title: Set aside some time
description: Be easy on yourself. It is okay to start with a 5-10 minute meditation and work up from there.

title: Choose a background sound
description: Prioritize nature sounds. You can choose silence if you want.

title: Find a comfortable posture
description: You can sit on the floor or in a chair, stand, walk, or lie down. Play around with different positions.

title: Settle your mind
description: Take a moment to identify the thoughts and feelings you are having. Then switch your focus to your physical position.

title: Take some deep breaths
description: Bring your awareness to your breath. Notice each inhalation and exhalation. Taking deep breaths helps relax your mind and body.

title: Focus on the present
description: When you find your mind wandering, return to your body, to your breath and to the present moment.

title: Let your thoughts and emotions go
description: When you notice thoughts or emotions coming up, choose not to focus on them. Let them come, let them go, without judgment.
